response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value and provides an excellent opportunity for you to maximize your investment. I am confident that this product will exceed your expectations and contribute significantly to your operations. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
